title: Welcome - Cordonnerie et Boutique Western
brand_gallery: Back to homepage
heading: An Unforgettable Stop
about_description:
Located in Shediac, Boutique Western et Autochtone specializes in shoemending.

The boutique was created by Mr. Georges Pinard in 1968. As a shoemaker for more than 50 years, he started his activities in Longueuil before relocating in Shediac in 2016.

With many years of experience, Mr. Pinard has a real know-how in the field. With our team of professionals, he is able to meet all your needs and expectations.

We provide maintenance and repair of all types of shoes and shoe-related apparel. In addition, we perform quality work that is quick and neat.

Western products are available in our store. In particular, we sell clothing, hats, boots and western accessories.

We offer our customers a personalized and quality experience.
love_description: Our antiques are handmade and chosen with love.
contact_subheading: For any questions regarding our inventory, location, hours or more!
